item.title: LeetCode[1179] Reformat Department Table
item.description: Question Table: Department +---------------+---------+ | Column Name | Type | +---------------+---------+ | id | int | | revenue | int | | month | varchar | +---------------+---------+ (id, month) is the primary key of this table. The table has information about the revenue of each department per month. The month has values in ["Jan","Feb","Mar","Apr","May","Jun","Jul","Aug","Sep","Oct","Nov","Dec"]. Write an SQL query to reformat the table such that there is a department id column and a revenue column for each month.
